title: keys
body: i have 1 month playing for 1 keys fragment what i do to get it ??

replies.body: I checked this out for you and see that you received over 12 fragments over the last month.  Fragments will drop at a slower rate the more you receive them, until it resets about every 28 days.  Up to that point, you're only able to obtain 12 keys not including honor capsule rewards.  More info also in our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide but I hope that helps!
